spec_data.Name: rpm-mpi-hooks
spec_data.Description:
RPM dependency generator hooks for MPI packages. This package should be added
as a BuildRequires to all mpi implementations (i.e. openmpi, mpich) as well as
a Requires to the their -devel packages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 09:43:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: RPM dependency generator hooks for MPI packages
